text.title: Lightning strikes kill 22 in Andhra Padesh, India
text.head: Lightning strikes kill 22 in Andhra Padesh, India
Sources

list.item: AP. "Lightning kills 22 people, mostly farm laborers, in southeast India's Andhra Pradesh state" — Fox News , September 7, 2015
"Lightning Kills 22 As Monsoon Storms Lash India" — Sky News , September 7, 2015
